snippet: India’s central bank surprised economists as it held interest rates steady, citing an expected reduction in food prices and a struggling domestic economy.
abstract: India’s central bank surprises economists as it holds interest rates steady, citing an expected reduction in food prices and a struggling domestic economy.
lead_paragraph: India’s central bank surprised economists as it held interest rates steady, citing an expected reduction in food prices and a struggling domestic economy.

headline.main: In an Unexpected Move, the Indian Central Bank Leaves Rates Unchanged
headline.print_headline: In an Unexpected Move, the Indian Central Bank Leaves Rates Unchanged
